document_data.mainbody:
Rhaekbog was a goblin raider member of the Legion of the Chimera in the early 14 century DR.
Rhaekbog was a trained goblin warrior, proficient in wearing armor and wielding shields, and used an axe in combat.
In the , the town of Targos in Icewind Dale became besieged by the Legion of the Chimera. One of the Legions surprise attacks involved teleporting goblins from underground tunnels into the Targos docks. A group of goblin sappers made it into the basement of one of the warehouses in the docks with the aid of an insiderâ€”a Luskanite mage named Phaen of the Rags. When Phaens treachery was uncovered, the wizard transported a group of goblins to attack adventuring defenders of Targos. Rhaekbog was among the goblins that came to the wizards aid and died in the process.
